pull.title: doc: add missing copyright headers
pull.body:
Add & amends a number of copyright headers.
Remove some now obselete doc/code.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/31864.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Stale ACK | [i-am-yuvi](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31864#pullrequestreview-2619570364), [l0rinc](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31864#pullrequestreview-2623350599) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with üëé to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.

While I admit having stronger feelings against the [copyright headers](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/29445) than I should (noise + bikeshedding + revoking right to copy in general), I do value consistency, so it's a üëç  from me - I wish we could unify more to get rid of this extra source of disagreement, but this PR makes it a bit better, so:

ACK 01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721

doc: add & amend copyright headers

events.body:
Not entirely clear to me which MIT license URL we're using now, and when we're using year ranges and when single years.

The changes since my last ack:
<details>
<summary>patch</summary>


```patch
diff --git a/src/clientversion.cpp b/src/clientversion.cpp
--- a/src/clientversion.cpp(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/clientversion.cpp(date 1741466438223)
@@ -96,6 +96,6 @@
            "\n" +
            "\n" +
            _("This is experimental software.") + "\n" +
-           strprintf(_("Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying file %s or %s"), "COPYING", "<https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>").translated +
+           strprintf(_("Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying file %s or %s"), "COPYING", "<https://opensource.org/license/MIT>").translated +
            "\n";
 }
Index: src/node/txdownloadman_impl.h
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.h b/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.h
--- a/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.h(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.h(date 1741466438223)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// Copyright (c) 2024-present The Bitcoin Core developers
+// Copyright (c) 2024 The Bitcoin Core developers
 // Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
 // file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
 #ifndef BITCOIN_NODE_TXDOWNLOADMAN_IMPL_H
Index: src/univalue/test/test_json.cpp
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/univalue/test/test_json.cpp b/src/univalue/test/test_json.cpp
--- a/src/univalue/test/test_json.cpp(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/univalue/test/test_json.cpp(date 1741466438224)
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+// Copyright 2014 BitPay Inc.
+// Copyright 2015-present Bitcoin Core Developers
+// Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
+// file COPYING or https://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
+
 // Test program that can be called by the JSON test suite at
 // https://github.com/nst/JSONTestSuite.
 //
Index: src/node/txdownloadman_impl.cpp
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.cpp b/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.cpp
--- a/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.cpp(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/node/txdownloadman_impl.cpp(date 1741466438223)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// Copyright (c) 2024-present The Bitcoin Core developers
+// Copyright (c) 2024 The Bitcoin Core developers
 // Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
 // file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
 
Index: src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h b/src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h
--- a/src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h(date 1741466438224)
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+// Copyright 2014 BitPay Inc.
+// Copyright 2015-present Bitcoin Core Developers
+// Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
+// file COPYING or https://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
+
 #ifndef BITCOIN_UNIVALUE_INCLUDE_UNIVALUE_ESCAPES_H
 #define BITCOIN_UNIVALUE_INCLUDE_UNIVALUE_ESCAPES_H
 static const char *escapes[256] = {
Index: src/bench/parse_hex.cpp
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/bench/parse_hex.cpp b/src/bench/parse_hex.cpp
--- a/src/bench/parse_hex.cpp(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/bench/parse_hex.cpp(date 1741466438223)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@

 // Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
 // file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
 
Index: src/util/transaction_identifier.h
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/util/transaction_identifier.h b/src/util/transaction_identifier.h
--- a/src/util/transaction_identifier.h(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/util/transaction_identifier.h(date 1741466438224)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@

 // Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
 // file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
 
Index: README.md
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/README.md b/README.md
--- a/README.md(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/README.md(date 1741466438223)
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@
 -------
 
 Bitcoin Core is released under the terms of the MIT license. See [COPYING](COPYING) for more
-information or see https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.
+information or see https://opensource.org/license/MIT.
 
 Development Process
 -------------------
Index: test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py b/test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py
--- a/test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py(date 1741466438224)
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env python3
+#
+# Copyright (c) 2024 The Bitcoin Core developers
+# Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
+# file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
+
 SHARED_EXCLUDED_SUBTREES = ["src/leveldb/",
                  "src/crc32c/",
                  "src/secp256k1/",
Index: src/wallet/migrate.cpp
<+>UTF-8
===================================================================
diff --git a/src/wallet/migrate.cpp b/src/wallet/migrate.cpp
--- a/src/wallet/migrate.cpp(revision f4fec329f5353d2b904659e129ade239fee09d89)
+++ b/src/wallet/migrate.cpp(date 1741466438224)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// Copyright (c) 2024-present The Bitcoin Core developers
+// Copyright (c) 2024 The Bitcoin Core developers
 // Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
 // file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
```

</details>

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// Copyright (c) 2024- The Bitcoin Core developers
+// Copyright (c) 2024-present The Bitcoin Core developers
comments.body:
How were these files chosen for update?
I see that many other headers are missing the `-present` part:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/node/abort.cpp#L1
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/common/args.h#L1
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/bech32.h#L2

and many others have a older end year:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/bech32.cpp#L2
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/init/bitcoind.cpp#L1
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/ci/test/00_setup_env.sh#L3

or don't even contain a year:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/ci/lint_imagefile#L1

or have the SPDX header only:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/test/fuzz/FuzzedDataProvider.h#L5

or don't have any copyright header:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/test/lint/lint_ignore_dirs.py#L1
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/01b9a6183eb58dffac00f053e2742d924c84c721/src/univalue/include/univalue_escapes.h#L1

etc.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -94,7 +93,6 @@ def compile_copyright_regex(copyright_style, year_style, name):
     r"Satoshi Nakamoto",
     r"The Bitcoin Core developers",
     r"BitPay Inc\.",
-    r"University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign\.",
comments.body:
Only found these in Python dependencies, so: üëç 

Unrelated: we could update the script to change the end year to `present` instead

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -94,7 +93,6 @@ def compile_copyright_regex(copyright_style, year_style, name):
     r"Satoshi Nakamoto",
     r"The Bitcoin Core developers",
     r"BitPay Inc\.",
-    r"University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign\.",
comments.body: I have changes for this locally, but the value is low, and ideally all of this code will soon be removed.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+// Copyright (c) 2023-present The Bitcoin Core developers
+// Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying
+// file COPYING or http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.
comments.body:
Is there any reason for not updating these as well?
```suggestion
// file COPYING or https://opensource.org/license/MIT.
```
I see you've removed the `2024-present` from the latest push - is that a general direction from now on?
